# OpenOCR

#### Installing

Install and update using pip:

```
$ pip install -U openocr
```

#### A Simple Example

```
from openocr import OpenOCR

# Create an OpenOCR object
ocr = OpenOCR()

# Use the object to perform OCR on an image
text = ocr.ocr_image('path_to_your_image.jpg')
print(text)
```
